rawText:
Maria Antoniraj  
Senior Dotnet Developer  
antoni651@gmail.com | +971502669478 | https://www.linkedin.com/in/antoniraj-antoniraj-1a595a63/ 
Al Karama, Dubai, United Arab Emirates  
SUMMARY 
 
❖ 8.6 Years of experience in the Requirements Gathering, analysis, design, and development of 
web applications and database design, Deployment and supporting using Microsoft 
Technologies. 
❖ I am having good exposure on different domain like Insurance, Finance, Mutual Fund, 
Commercial, HRMS, and Healthcare projects for leading provider organizations. 
❖ Good in Microsoft Visual Studio IDE using ASP.NET, C#, MVC 5.0, .Net Core, Web API, WCF, 
ORM  (ADO,  EF),  Microservices,  SQL,  PL/SQL,  OOPS,  SOLID  Principle,  Design  Pattern,  AJAX, 
JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, CSS, Azure, git, LINQ, Angular 
❖ I  hold  a  good  knowledge  of  all  the  phases  of  software  Development  Life  Cycle  (SDLC)  and 
possesses exceptional analytical and problem – solving  skills and a good team player with 
excellent interpersonal and communication skills. 
❖ I  have  completed  my  Bachelor  of  Computer  Science  and  Master  of  Computer  Application  from 
India.

2. Azure Developer Associate, Institute – Microsoft, Year 2025 
3. Hardware, Institute – Systech, Location -Trichy, Year 2011 
4. Typewriting English, Department of Technical Education, Tamil Nadu, Year 2011 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

Projects Summary 
1. General Electric (GE) – Radiology 
2. Loreal India  
3. Project Management Information System (PMIS) for AVEVA Global Services – Project Space 
4. Charles Schwab 
5. Tata Aviva 
6. MOSS AP 
7. CAMSOnline 
8. Insunet 
9. HRMS 
10. PHIS Online 
 
Company: CitiusTech Healthcare Technology Pvt Ltd 
 
Title  Project: General Electric (GE) - Radiology, Location: Bangalore – India, 
 Duration: Sep 2024 - Feb 2025 
Description 
GE HealthCare provides clinicians with innovative imaging solutions and 
pharmaceutical diagnostic imaging agents for their radiology departments, 
including Computed Tomography, Magnetic Resonance Imaging, Ultrasound, 
Molecular Imaging, X-Ray, Mammography, CT scan, MRI, Interventional Image 
Guided Systems, Surgical Imaging and Radiology IT. 
Our intelligent products and solutions help achieve faster, easier exam 
workflows, improved clinical outcomes and drive efficient imaging operations..  
Team Size 8 
Technologies 
.Net Core, C#, Web API, WCF, jQuery, Ajax, GIT, Web Application, CSS, LINQ, 
bootstrap, SQL, Stored Procedure, Views, Microsoft Azure Cloud, Entity 
Framework, Design Pattern, microservices, unit testing, Angular 
Roles and Responsibility 
Done some security-based enhancement and changes, Developed Finacle API, 
and buck fixing tasks,  
Developed and tested different cases 
Back-end coding of Application and hardware setup 
Maintained code versions on GitHub 
Developed and integrated API, identified bugs and provided solution 
Deployed changes to git repository by DevOps 
 
Company: WIPRO LTD 
Title  Project: Loreal India, Location: Mumbai – India, 
 Duration - Aug 2023 - Nov 2023 
Description 
“LEAP Portal” is a web portal accessed by trainers of all divisions for education 
reporting, Scheduling calendar Record education activities like Booking 
participants Mark Attendance Evaluation Stock Utilization Manual 
update/uploaded from DART or free Issue tracker Leap Closing.  
“Leap app” is a mobile tool used to register hairdressers and salons to LEAP. 
Also, trainers can report education activities using Classroom Module. It’s for 
Sales and Trainer. Another five websites Lucky Draw, MLJ Application, Staffs 
Sales Application, The store Application, TNA_Application. SalesPortal for 
Financial Activities. 
Team Size 2 
Technologies 
ASP.NET Webforms, ASP.NET MVC, C#, Web API, WCF, Windows Schedular, 
jQuery, Ajax, GIT, CSS, LINQ, bootstrap, SQL, Stored Procedure, Views, 
Microsoft Azure Cloud, ADO.NET, microservices, Angular 

Roles and Responsibility 
Developed and tested different cases 
Back-end coding of Application and hardware setup 
Maintained code versions on GitHub 
Developed and integrated API, identified bugs and provided solution 
Deployed changes to git repository by DevOps 
 
Company: WIPRO LTD 
 
Title Project: Project Management Information System (PMIS) for AVEVA 
Global, Location: Bangalore – India, Duration:  July 2020 - July 2023 
Description 
Projectspace is an AVEVA internal web application which serves as the Project 
Management Information System (PMIS) for AVEVA Global Services. 
Projectspace receives and displays financial data from AVEVA’s Oracle, and 
Projectspace allows project managers to enter project status data (referred to 
as non-financial data). The combination of financial and non-financial data 
presented in Projectspace creates a complete status overview for all Global 
Services projects. The status overview allows project managers and other 
managers to properly monitor and control Global Service projects. 
Projectspace (Web Application), Projectspace Batch job (Daily and monthly task 
schedular), CSAT (Customer survey Web Application), CSAT Survey Service 
(Survey Initiate Request Service), CSAT Response Service (Survey Response 
capture Web Service) 
Team Size 3 
Technologies 
.Net MVC5, C#, Web API, WCF, jQuery, Unobtrusive Validation, GIT, 
Microservices, CSS, bootstrap, LINQ, SQL, Oracle pl/SQL, Stored Procedure, 
Views, Microsoft Azure Cloud, Entity Framework, Design Pattern 
Roles and Responsibility 
Gathering requirements and understanding the client needs 
Developed modules, resolved bugs and kept on time support 
Monitor and track entire application with daily basis 
Written testcase for functions, debug and troubleshoot the issues 
Worked in offshore development and supported onsite tasks 
Supported with onsite people parallelly to develop business dashboard 
Documented for Artifact, project flow diagram and created requirements 
document, also the test case and use case documents, Documented API Details 
Deployed to Azure cloud using git 
 
Company: WIPRO LTD 
 
Title Project: Charles Schwab, Location: Bangalore – India,  
Duration: Dec 2019 - June 2020 
Description 
RWT –Retail Web Technologies is Web application using in Charles Schwab 
Investment Management. 
Team Size 4 
Technologies .Net core, Web API, Angular 8, jQuery, Unobtrusive Validation, Test Driven 
Development- Nunit, Moq, Agile Methodologies, Jira- Tracking Development 
Process, Stash- Maintaining Repositories, GIT, VSTS, MICROSOFT AZURE Cloud, 
Microservices, Entity Framework, Design Pattern, LINQ, unit testing, Angular 
Roles and Responsibility 
Worked sprint story with Agile team 
Identified bugs, troubleshoot the issues 
Done query changes and written stored procedure in RWT Database 
Worked for environment setup and maintained documents 
Gathering requirements and understanding the client needs 
Provide KT and train the new resource 
 
 
     
 

Company: Future Focus Infotech Pvt Ltd 
 
Title 
Project: AVIVA, Location: Bangalore – India, Duration: Apr2018 - Dec2018 
 
Description 
AVIVA are the largest general insurer and a leading life and pensions provider 
and they have a strong international presence in Europe, Canada and Asia. 
Aviva offer a wide range of insurance and savings products to help people 
protect what’s important to them and save for a comfortable future. Aviva 
Customer portal is a Hub and there are many micro applications My Policy, My 
Pension, My Documents, My Motor, My Home, My Profile, My Claim, My 
Payments, My Health, Esecurity, and etc. 
Team Size 8 
Technologies 
C# MVC, .Netcore, Web API, Entity Framework, StructureMap DI, jQuery 
Microservices, Test Driven Development- Nunit, Moq, Agile Methodologies, 
Jira- Tracking Development Process, Stash- Maintaining Repositories, GIT, 
VSTS, MICROSOFT AZURE Cloud, Design Pattern, unit testing 
Roles and Responsibility 
Followed agile based work mode with Scrum master 
Worked story task in every sprint 
Mentoring team members to understand the AVIVA Application 
Provided KT and trained new resources 
Done test driven development and reviewed for quality code 
Connected with different team members in distributed application 
  
Company: Joulestowatts Business Solutions Pvt Ltd 
 
Title 
Project: MOSS AP, Location: Chennai – India, Duration: Sep2017 - March 2018 
Description 
MOSS “Merchant Operations Support System” is used by ASIA-PACIFIC users 
(Sales Person) to onboard merchant’s contract information through MOSS AP 
UI. The merchant information was closely scrutinized by the Global payments 
teams in different stages and processed for further approvals. The on boarding 
of the merchant follows the workflow and the information is passed to 
different downstream system. 
Team Size 5 
Technologies ASP.NET MVC, C#, Web Service, Web Application, WEB API, CSS, XML, SQL, 
Stored Procedure, Microsoft Azure cloud, git, microservices. 
Roles and Responsibility 
Had support role in that dedicated team 
Document preparation and database changes 
Monitoring the entire application everyday 
Written API function 
Concentrated application performance, memory management and application 
security 
Company: Sterling Software Pvt Ltd 
 
Title  Project: CAMSOnline, Location: Chennai – India, Duration 2016 - Aug 2017 
Description CAMSOnline is the Mutual Fund and NSE Website used by CAMS Organization. 
The main objective of this website is to handle all the purchase and sales order 
transactions of Mutual Fund and to generate the statistical reports. 
Team Size 5 
Technologies 
ASP.NET Web Form, C#, Web Service, CSS, Java Script, MRT Report, Crystal 
Report, Stored Procedure, SQL, IIS, WCF, git, unit testing 

Roles and Responsibility Developed Mutual Fund application in the Scratch level 
Trained bellowed team members to understand the client requirements 
Developed database design – Written stored procedure, function, view and 
trigger 
Have attended lot of training for Mutual Fund domain conducted by CAMS 
Developed web services 
Designed MRT Tool for report generation 
Deployed changes to IIS Server 
 
Company: Sterling Software Pvt Ltd 
 
Title  Project: Insunet, Location: Chennai – India, Duration: Feb2016 - Aug2017 
Description 
Insunet is Life, Health and Motor Insurance Management application. This 
application acts as a platform to maintain all their business activities under one 
roof from various places in and around the globe. 
Through this site the policy holder can join for various policies and then they 
can follow entire process of Insurance. 
Team Size 4 
Technologies ASP.NET Web Forms, C#, ADO.NET, CSS, Java Script, AJAX, Stored Procedure, 
SQL, IIS, windows server, MRT Report, Crystal Report, WCF, Web Service, 
microservices, unit testing. 
Roles and Responsibility Developed Mutual Fund application in the Scratch level 
Trained bellowed team members to understand the client requirements 
 
 
Developed database design – Written stored procedure, function, view and 
trigger 
Have attended lot of training for Mutual Fund domain conducted by CAMS 
Developed web services 
Designed MRT Tool for report generation 
Deployed changes to IIS Server 
Company: Hesperus Infosys 
 
Title Project: HRMS - Human Resource Management System, Location: Chennai 
– India, Duration: Oct 2014 - Oct 2015 
Description 
This project titled “Human Resource Management System” is considered as 
Management application. Main purpose of this application maintained the 
data about Company or College Employees, Students every day follow-ups, 
Scheme Calculation, and payment details. This application acts as a platform to 
maintain all their branches activities under one roof from various places in and 
around the globe. 
Finally, the reports will be generated by this system based on branch wise and 
company wise (ex: Daily, Monthly, and yearly etc...) 
The Modules about Time and Attendance, Payroll System, Recruitment Process, 
Performance and Appraisal, Career and Development. 
Team Size 4 
Technologies 
ASP.NET Web Form, C#, CSS, ADO.NET, Java Script, AJAX, SQL Server2008, 
Stored Procedure, Crystal Reports, IIS, 
Roles and Responsibility 
Developed entire application with scratch level 
Developed complete database design 
Visited client place to understand the business process and product 
Monitoring the application for daily basis 
Concentrated application performance, memory management and application 
security 
Taken care of application deployment and server performance 
 
    
 

 Internship: JJS 
 
Title PHIS Online (Public Health Information System), Location: Chennai – India, 
Description 
A Web Application developed for a health organization. The purpose of 
the project is collecting the health data from the Public and Schools 
in various divisions and generates various types of reports (Monthly 
and yearly). 
Team Size 4 
Technologies ASP.NET MVC, MS-SQL, IIS, 
Roles and Responsibility Developed some modules in the Public Health Information System 
It was college Internship project 
 
 
 
Permanent Address: 
NO. 165, South Street, Gandhi Nagar, Iruppukurichi, Virudhachalam, Tamil Nadu, India -607804 
Mobile: +91 9108152578
